messages.subject: Bill Cosby was Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Unschooling a Aspie?
messages.msgSnippet: Wow. It is amazing how different my life is now to when it was when I first heard that. Chocolate cake for breakfast should never cause a conniption. Never.
messages.messageBody:
Wow. It is amazing how different my life is now to when it was when I first
heard that. Chocolate cake for breakfast should never cause a conniption.
Never.

Schuyler
www.waynforth.blogspot.com
----- Original Message -----
From: "Michelle Leifur Reid" <pamperedmichelle@...>
To: <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2006 3:24 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Unschooling a Aspie?


> On 11/20/06, Debra Rossing <debra.rossing@...> wrote:
>> "Of course this is coming from someone who can justify ice cream for
>> breakfast! LOL"
>>
>> Or the Bill Cosby routine "Dad is great! Gives us chocolate cake!" The
>> kids ask for cake for breakfast and the dad in the skit thinks "Cake?
>> Cake has milk, eggs, flour ...Sure, let's have cake!"
>
> For those of you a bit too young to have seen it originally:
>
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNStwTlQgJE
>
> Michelle - showing her age
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
>
